meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the family Convolvulaceae.
meanings.sent1: Ipomoeas are beautiful flowers that bloom in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The ipomoeas in the backyard are growing taller each day.
meanings.sent3: The ipomoeas in the garden seem to wave hello in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening blossomed like the ipomoeas in spring.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the ipomoeas brightened up the entire yard.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Ipomoea.
meanings.sent1: I planted an ipomoeas in the pot on my windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The ipomoeas in the park attract many butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn near the ipomoeas.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams flourished like the ipomoeas spreading across the field.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the ipomoeas filled the air with sweetness.
